lines.text: You always take a leak with a gun in your hand? That's a good way to blow your balls off!
Tell me something, when was the last time YOU had a mental test?
...anytime, Commissioner.
As a matter of fact, didn't you try to shoot yourself a couple of years back?
...gun went off.
Look at the size of those hematomas!
Are you sure I can't give you a lift?
I'd rather face the muggers.
He'll kill again... he enjoys killing.
Matt believed in the old saying "Shoot first, ask questions later."

And so this years St Patrick's Day parade continues on schedule, despite speculation the parade may have been cancelled due to fear of violence. Authorities report scores of death threats against the police, plus threats of bombings along the parade route. But this has not deterred a record crowd for turning out for New York's St Patrick's Day parade.

[glances at spectacle]
... what a parade it is.
You're the one that dropped out of therapy!
He knows! He knows! He knows I'm no good to him!
Gina this isn't about romance. It's about murder.

We have a C2/C3 fracture dislocation. The head was unstable and there was a sudden deceleration injury. The residual hanging; where the head just "pops". That's not what's interesting. What's interesting is we have a crushed larynx. The head's just flopping.
You're tryin' to tell me two kids did this?
Lieutenant, I've been going over your report. Seems you automatically assume it was a police officer instead of some lunatic son-of-a-bitch dressed up like a cop.
It couldn't of have just been a bullet-proof vest. I hit him in the head at least twice!
Look at the marks on your throat.
I'm telling you, Frank. His hands were so big, and they felt like ice... even through his gloves. He wasn't breathing.
Hah... we won't put that in our report, huh?
Whole city's goin' to hell. You can't take a pee anywhere anymore.
They don't make cops like him anymore. He was one of a kind.
He still is.

[shooting his gun]
Cordell! Son-of-a-bitch!
